job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtPositionampnbspltstronggtMid to senior level software engineerltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWho We AreltstronggtltpgtltpgtMLJ Environmental is a small consulting firm located in Davis California that develops customized software solutions for its clientsampnbspWe have over 25 years of experience protecting the prosperity of communities and their natural resourcesampnbspWe simplify regulatory compliance with innovative approaches to science and data MLJ Environmental is seeking a mid to senior level software developer to join our teamampnbspOur staff are bright innovative individuals who are interested in taking on new challenges within their careers The successful candidate should be comfortable in all aspects of software development ampnbspThis person should be comfortable working both independently and in a small groupampnbspWe are seeking an individual willing to learn be flexible and creative We are a dog friendly officeltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtSchedule and SalaryltstronggtltpgtltpgtThis is an exempt full time position with 40 hours a weekampnbspThe salary will be based on experience and competitive within the industry and local marketampnbspFull time employment benefits include health vision dental and life insurance Other benefits include vacation paid holidays sick leave and a 401K planltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtExample of DutiesltstronggtltpgtltpgtltemgtEssential functions may include but are not limited to the followingltemgtltpgtltulgtltligtDevelop Microsoft ASPNET MVC web applications using CltligtltligtUse Visual studio for application developmentltligtltligtDetermine solutions to technical hurdles that may arise during the design testing and maintenance processltligtltligtCollaborate with testing team design team and implementation team using various diagrams flow charts and models to assist with internal communicationltligtltligtIdentify and address performance concerns including fixing bugs andor addressing client concernsltligtltligtEnsure that projects meet client deadlinesltligtltligtDocument aspects of the systemproject for future upgrades and maintenanceltligtltligtOther duties as assignedltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtCompleted a bachelors degree in Computer ScienceComputer EngineeringCISMIS or a related fieldltligtltligtMinimum of 3 years of experience within software development ltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtSkillsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWell versed in HTML5 CSS SASS Javascript JSON and JqueryltligtltligtSome knowledge of relational databases SQL MySQL MSSQLltligtltligtExposure to cloud technologies Amazon Web ServicesAWS ltligtltligtAttention to detail and organization to be able towork on various parts of a system or application while being accurate and thoroughltligtltligtThe ability to adapt and work on multiple different projects in the same day ltligtltligtThe ability to work in a collaborative environment and communicate Examples include team white board sessions storyboarding design concepts and fleshing out pros and cons of various design options ltligtltulgtltpgtTo apply please send a 1 cover letter 2 resume and 3 contact information for three references to Trisha Turner at tturnermljenvironmentalcom Please include in the subject line Software Engineer Application and reference in the email where you heard about this position in the emailampnbspApplications missing any of the above may not be considered for this position ampnbspampnbspNo phone calls pleaseampnbspAdditional information regarding MLJ can be found on our website at wwwmljenvironmentalcomltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
